org.opends.server.backends.jeb.importLDIF

Class IndexInputBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.backends.jeb.importLDIF.IndexInputBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<IndexInputBuffer>

    public final class IndexInputBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<IndexInputBuffer>
    The buffer class is used to process a buffer from the temporary index files during phase 2 processing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IndexInputBuffer

        public IndexInputBuffer(org.opends.server.backends.jeb.importLDIF.Importer.IndexManager indexMgr,
                java.nio.channels.FileChannel channel,
                long begin,
                long end,
                int id,
                int cacheSize)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new index input buffer.
        Parameters:
        indexMgr - The index manager.
        channel - The index file channel.
        begin - The position of the start of the buffer in the scratch file.
        end - The position of the end of the buffer in the scratch file.
        id - The index ID.
        cacheSize - The cache size.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurred when priming the cache.
